resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/81640</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>81640</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4390</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Phonic Worksheets - Long vowel sounds "e", "i"</string>
            <string language="es">Hojas de trabajo de fonética – sonidos de las vocales largas “e”, “i”</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileoga Oibre Foghrúchán – fuaimeanna gutuaí fada “e”, “i”</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Phonische Bogen - langer Vokal klingt "e", "i"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tableaux phoniques - la longue voyelle retentit 
"e", "I"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folhas phonic - a vogal longa soa "e", "i"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Fogli di lavoro phonic - la vocale lunga suona "la
e", "i"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φωνητικά φύλλα εργασίας - μακροχρόνιοι ήχοι "ε" 
φωνήεντος, "ι"</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This resource is for pupils who are with learning difficulties. It is a set of four worksheets on the Long vowel sounds - ee, ea, igh, y</string>
            <string language="es">Este recurso es para alumnos que tengan dificultades de aprendizaje. Es un conjunto de cuatro hojas de trabajo sobre los sonidos de las vocales largas –ee, ea, igh, y</string>
            <string language="ga">Tá an acmhainn seo do dhaltaí le deacrachtaí foghlama. Is sraith de cheithre bhileog oibre é ar fuaimeanna gutaí Fada – ee, ea, igh, y</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">English</string>
            <string language="es">Inglés. Hoja de trabajo</string>
            <string language="ga">Béarla</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Worksheet</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog Oibre</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Hilfsmittel ist für Schüler, die mit 
erlernenschwierigkeiten sind. Es ist ein Set von vier Bogen auf 
den langen Vokaltönen - ee, EA, igh, y</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette ressource est pour les élèves qui sont 
avec des difficultés d'étude. C'est un ensemble de quatre 
tableaux sur les longs bruits de voyelle - l'ee, ea, l'igh, y</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este recurso é para os alunos que são com 
dificuldades de aprendizagem. É um jogo de quatro folhas nos 
sons longos da vogal - ee, ea, igh, y</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa risorsa è per gli allievi che sono con le 
difficoltà imparanti. È un insieme di quattro fogli di lavoro 
sui suoni lunghi di vocale - ee, ea, igh, y</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το στοιχείο συμπεριφοράς είναι για τους μαθητές 
που είναι με τις μαθησιακές δυσκολίες. Είναι ένα σύνολο 
τεσσάρων φύλλων εργασίας στους μακροχρόνιους ήχους φωνήεντος - 
EE, ea, igh, Υ</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bogen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anglais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tableau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Inglês</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Inglese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio di lavoro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αγγλικά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλλο εργασίας</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

All materials may be downloaded and copied for non-commercial purposes only, provided that the source is acknowledged. The reproduction of material for commercial purposes is strictly prohibited.
